text:
Here’s what BJP spokespersons & their media allies have been desperately told to cover up: 

West Bengal CM @MamataOfficial requested the Centre for 1 lakh PPE kits.

Guess how many were given?

ONLY 3000 kits. 

PM CARES has collected over 10,000 crores. For what? No one knows.
